profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.11 Fonts - 6.2.11.3 Composite fonts - WMode
profile.description: For those CMaps that are embedded, the integer value of the WMode entry in the CMap dictionary shall be identical to the WMode value in the embedded CMap stream.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: For those CMaps that are embedded, the integer value of the WMode entry in the CMap dictionary shall be identical to the WMode value in the embedded CMap stream.

error.message: WMode entry in the embedded CMap and in the CMap dictionary are not identical
